verbs.description: [ARG0: Roger Stone , a longtime adviser to Donald Trump ,] [V: asserted] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] [ARG1: that the Russia investigation , lead by special counsel Robert Mueller , is a secret plot to silence his political speech] .
